title: Hoover Dam
subtle:
Informational (nonfiction), 527 words, Level M (Grade 2), Lexile 580L            
                        
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     V and Z1
description: Hoover Dam stands as one of the greatest engineering feats in the United States. It helped transform the American Southwest, allowing water from the Colorado River to be used throughout the desert landscape. Students will enjoy learning about how the dam was built and how it operates.
highFrequencyWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
